info.structure_gel.hold_shift: 按住 [Shift] 了解更多訊息。
info.structure_gel.gunpowder: •使用火藥摧毀所有連接的凝膠。
info.structure_gel.default: •沿著主要方向傳播凝膠，僅更換空氣。
info.structure_gel.photosensitive: •僅在不暴露在天空的位置傳播凝膠。非常適合帶開放式牆壁的房間。
info.structure_gel.diagonal_spread: 沿著基數和對角線的方向傳播。很有用能繞過藤蔓和其他奇怪的角落
info.structure_gel.dynamic_spread_dist: •根據所持有的凝膠的數個，將凝膠與設定的距離進行擴展。最多50 。
info.structure_gel.axis_spread: •根據凝膠的放置方式在平面上展開凝膠。
info.structure_gel.unknown_behavior: •此區塊的行為未定義。請確保在代碼中使用或擴展了結構凝膠塊。
commands.structure_gel.clone.override: Overriding vanilla clone limit of %s blocks by cloning %s blocks. This may take some time
commands.structure_gel.fill.override: Overriding vanilla fill limit of %s blocks by filling %s blocks. This may take some time
You need access to commands to access items in this tab.
gui.structure_gel.data_handler.structure: The loot table to give the block being placed.
The block state that will be placed.
The percent chance that this will place a block.
Determines if this block should work with the Lootr mod.
The item in the head slot.
The item in the chestplate slot.
The item in the leggings slot.
The item in the boots slot.
The item held in the main-hand slot.
The item held in the main-hand slot.
The loot table for this entity, if applicable.
When true, the entity won't despawn based on its own.
The percent chance of this mob spawning.
The NBT tag to load into this entity. All other fields take priority.
The registry name of the DynamicSpawnerType to create a spawner from.
The percent chance that this will place a Dynamic Spawner.
The configured feature to attempt to generate.
The percent chance that this will generate a feature.
The NBT tag to load into this block if it's a block entity.
The percent chance that this will place a block.
item.structure_gel.building_tool.info.ho:
• Press [%s] in the air to select a mode.
• For modes that require a selected block, you can right click with an item held in your mouse onto this stack to select that block.
info.structure_gel.building_tool.message: You do not have permission to use this item
item.structure_gel.building_tool.mode.de: • Wait... How'd you get here? Oh well, you're here now so I guess this isn't a secret anymore. While I have your attention, don't forget to stay hydrated!

• Removes the blocks in the selected area.

• Press [%s] on a block to select the first corner.
• Press [%s] on another block to select the second corner.
• Press [%s] to clear the area.

• Fills the selected area with the block selected.

• Press [%s] on a block to select what to fill with.
• Press [%s] on a block to select the first corner.
• Press [%s] on another block to select the second corner.
• Press [%s] to fill the area with the selected block.

• Clones the selected area to your location.

• Press [%s] on a block to select the first corner.
• Press [%s] on another block to select the second corner.
• Press [%s] to clone the selected area to your location.

• Floods the y level against the side of the block clicked with the block selected.

• Press [%s] on a block to select what to flood with.
• Press [%s] or [%s] on the side of a block that faces where you intend to flood.

• Detects a shape based on the side of the block clicked and continues it in the direction that was clicked.

• Press [%s] or [%s] the side of a block to extend a shape.

• Moves the region selected in the direction you're looking.

• Press [%s] on a block to select the first corner.
• Press [%s] on another block to select the second corner.
• Press [%s] to move the area in the direction you're looking.

• Places a line of blocks between the positions selected.

• Press [%s] on a block to select what to fill with.
• Press [%s] on a block to select the first position.
• Press [%s] on another block to select the second position.
• Press [%s] to place the line using the selected block.

• Fills the blocks around where you click with the block selected.

• Press [%s] on a block to select what to place.
• Press [%s] or [%s] to fill the blocks around where you click.
info.structure_gel.building_tool.undo.de:
• Undoes the previous action performed with a %s.
• You may also press [%s].
info.structure_gel.building_tool.redo.de:
• Redoes a previously undone action performed with a %s.
• You may also press [%s].
info.structure_gel.building_tool.select_:
• Uses your current position as one of the positions for the current mode.
• If both positions are selected, this button clears the positions.
info.structure_gel.building_tool.selecte:
• The block that will be placed if the current mode supports it.
• Current value: %s.
info.structure_gel.building_tool.propert: • Determines how many of the blocks will actually be placed.
• The radius of the area affected.
• How far the selected area should be moved.
• When true, maintains the exact block state of the selected block. When false, the blocks placed will place according to how they would naturally place, if they can be palced.
• Determines what blocks should be replaced.
• Rotates what the currently selected tool mode will place by the amount selected.
• Mirrors what the currently selected tool mode will place along the axis selected.
• When true, removes the original region from the world.
• Changes how the fill function works, similar to how the fill command works.
• Determines the shape of the area to affect.
